title: Add Javadoc on field in Type Hierarchy does nothing
OB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view, the option to add Javadoc does not perform any action.
EB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view, the option to add Javadoc should open a dialog or prompt where the user can enter the Javadoc for the selected field.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Open the Type Hierarchy view. 2. Select a field in the view and right-click on it. 3. Look for the 'Add Javadoc' option and click on it. 4. Observe that no dialog or prompt appears to enter the Javadoc for the selected field.
